name: outcome_hourly_data
title: Outcome measurements (hourly) for ICU patients extracted from MIMIC-III
license: The use of data is conditional on citing the original data sources.

fields.name: subject_id
fields.description: ID number for subject within PATIENTS table

fields.name: hadm_id
fields.description: ID number for subject within ADMISSIONS table

fields.name: icustay_id
fields.description: ID number for subject within ICUSTAYS table

fields.name: hours_in
fields.description: Number of hours subject in ICU before measurement taken.

fields.name: vent
fields.description: Mechanical ventilator used at current timestep (1 = present, 0 = not).

fields.name: vaso
fields.description: Vasopressors given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: adenosine
fields.description: adenosine given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: dobutamine
fields.description: dobutamine given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: dopamine
fields.description: dopamine given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: epinephrine
fields.description: epinephrine given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: isuprel
fields.description: isuprel given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: milrinone
fields.description: milrinone given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: norepinephrine
fields.description: norepinephrine given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: phenylephrine
fields.description: phenylephrine given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: vasopressin
fields.description: vasopressin given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: colloid_bolus
fields.description: colloid bolus given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: crystalloid_bolus
fields.description: crystalloid bolus given via IV at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).

fields.name: nivdurations
fields.description: Non-invasive ventilator used at current timestep (1 = yes, 0 = no).
